step_feedback.feedback: Your first repetition was a bit shaky, especially in your wrists. Focus on keeping your shoulders the main movers. The second repetition was much better, showing good control.
You're doing a great job squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to make the circular motion smoother, especially as you bring your shoulders forward. Keep up the good work!
Your shoulder blade movement is excellent! For the final repetitions, try to coordinate this with a deep inhale as you pull back, as suggested in the tip, to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply as you pull back to help your breathing and oxygen flow.
